desc: Visit our website for wood sign decor & to schedule sign classes. We are a fully mobile wood sign DIY company and will travel to your location. We provide all the supplies for your guests to make a custom wood sign led by our talented instructor. Don't have time to take a class? All our signs are available for sale.

layout.text: Want to make your own DIY Project?

We bring the party to you. Our fully mobile DIY workshop parties are great for all occasions. Birthday parties, bridal showers, kids parties, company events or girls night out. Our instructor led parties will allow your guests with any skill level to complete a project from start to finish in a 2 to 3 hour time frame. All parties are customized with several design selections for your guests to choose from. We provide all the materials needed to make each project.
Browse our product inventory for different projects  for your party.
No time to hold a class? All our inventory is available for sale. Add it to your cart and check out. We will ship the sign directly to you or you can choose to pick up locally.
Contact us for more information or if you have any additional questions. We look forward to your next DIY Party with Kim!
